Description: Small amulet of a lying ram with bended legs, made of red faience. A cylindrical hole runs horizontally through the bottom part. Rear shows no details while the front is carefully designed, mould made.
Findspot: Excavated/Findspot: Amara West (Nubia), D14.5, over level 3
Bibliographic references: Spencer 1997 / Amara West I, The Architectural Report (p. 106)
